ovdesc.p: This is a concat file that will be maintained from the CG.BASE.BUILDER utility application.
The file will be used by the end of day process 'EOD.BUILD.CG.TXN.BASE' to select the portfolio & security master id combinations for which a build process is to be performed.

desc.p: This field contains a list of the IDs of the CG.BASE.BUILDER file that point to the portfolio & security master id combinations that need to be processed for the CG transaction base updates.
This is the key to the concat file. It will be populated with the date on which the records in the field CG.BUILD.KEYS were verified.
